name: Hatched!
description:
Take care of your little pet Dino in this Tamagotchi inspired pet simulator!

Remember to feed and clean up after your dino buddy! Play with blocks and watch TV to hang out and keep them company as the virtual days pass by! 

Music (4 wonderful tracks) by Lazernaut, www.lazernaut.com

Made for Dinojam1 hosted by SleepingPandaGames.

Note: TV doesn't seem to work on the web build, sadly :((
